statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Gualtemala Antigua coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${9.70} per pound with some Ethiopian coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${12.30} per pound to create \displaystyle{30} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${11.26} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound.
